struct _kheapHeader * prev
Previous block in the chunk.

Next block of the chunk.

uint32_t size
Size of the chunk minus the size of this header.

simplesect.title: Detailed Description
simplesect.para: This structure represent a block inside the linked list of the heap. (It really is only a contiguous block of memory) It is based in the header of the chunk. Thus, when returned, it is important to remember to add sizeof(kheapHeader); and when a pointer is received, subtract it.
